title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column name is displayed instead of the alias set for the column in the dataset.
EB: The expression builder should show the alias that was set for the column in the dataset, not the old column name.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset from the list. The alias 'column1' should be displayed instead of the old column name.
